Package: com.bmuschko.gradle.tomcat.internal

[Groovy] Class ShutdownMonitor

      • com.bmuschko.gradle.tomcat.internal.ShutdownMonitor

      • Monitor that keeps thread running until stop command got issued.

        Authors:
        Benjamin Muschko
